title: Textile, ca. 1300
medium:
Medium: wool, cotton
Technique: Somewhat warp-faced plain weave with grouping of warps for weft-faced plain weave: slit tapestry; predominantly warp-faced plain weave; ONE CORNER: slit tapestry on group parps, nonhorizontal wefts for outline, wrapping; SI
description: end of a loin cloth with triangular-shaped woven area at one corner: interlocked birds in two shades of light brown outlined with red forming a triangular-shaped all-over patterned area which is framed in red. the wide stepped edge on the inside contains birds, each with head ornaments, in shades of brown and yellow with black outlines.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1300.Medium: wool, cotton
Technique: Somewhat warp-faced plain weave with grouping of warps for weft-faced plain weave: slit tapestry; predominantly warp-faced plain weave; ONE CORNER: slit tapestry on group parps, nonhorizontal wefts for outline, wrapping; SI. Gift of Harry Dennis Jr.. 1969-76-3.
